Webhosting24: Get a Ryzen VPS in Tokyo for only €15/year!

cheap asia vps, cheap vps, munich, singapore, tokyo, webhosting24 June 15, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Hello, Webhosting24!

They’re new to LowEndBox and are bringing us some offers in Tokyo, Singapore, and Munich.  Nice to see Tokyo – that’s not that common.

What kind of offers?

  • Start out with a 512MB Ryzen for only €15/year
  • Or for €2.70/month, get a 1GB on Ryzen 3900X
  • Or double that to 2GB for only €5.70/month

And coming soon: Sydney (read below).

Their WHOIS is public. They are registered in Italy (INCUBATEC GmbH – Srl), Germany (webhosting24 GmbH), and Delaware (Own Identity, Inc.) (IT02283140214). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site (AUP).. They accept Creditcard, PayPal, Wire transfer (SEPA) and Cryptocurrencies.

Here’s a little about Webhosting24 in their own words:

“We are a Hoster, so you can be a Builder” is our slogan, Webhosting24 is the “do-it-yourself” Hosting division/brand of INCUBATEC (while Server24 is the Managed Services division/brand).

“We are a small group of companies active in the hosting, domain and server/cloud space since 2001 and our two main data centers are located in Munich, Germany and interconnected with dark fiber (we have 18 PoPs worldwide and we plan to further expand in 2021).

We have an ICANN Registrar (Own Identity, Inc.), are members of RIPE (https://www.ripe.net/membership/indices/data/it.incubatec-com.html & https://www.ripe.net/membership/indices/data/de.webhosting24.html) & APNIC and have our own AS-numbers and IP-addresses. We are accredited at Registro ccTLD .IT, NicAT .AT, EURid .EU, AFNIC .FR and many others (including of course VeriSign, NeuStar etc. with the ICANN Registrar).

Webhosting24 Roadmap:

After launching in Singapore and Japan, within the next weeks we will relaunch in Sydeny and in the second quarter of 2021 we plan to further expand our American server locations, so that we will have three active main hubs (Munich – our main hub in the EU, APAC with Singapore, Tokyo and Sydney, and US with New York, Los Angeles and/or Miami, which will become our main hub in the Americas). From a software and bundle perspective we are looking at offering reseller packages with DirectAdmin and once all three main hubs are active, we will activate internal & private networking and many other features like BGP- and anycast services.”

If you have been a customer of Webhosting24 or you give them a try out now, please comment below.

Now read more to see the offers!
